DataElement.preferredName: EORTC QLQ-LC13 12.1 During Past Week Had Pain in Other Parts of Body Anatomic Site Text

DataElementConcept.preferredName: EORTC Quality of Life Questionnaire - Lung Cancer Module During Past Week Had Pain in Other Parts of Body Anatomic Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A modular supplement to the EORTC Core Quality of Life Questionnaire (QLQ-C30) for use in lung cancer clinical trials._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about whether an individual has or had pain in other parts of their body._Named locations of or within the body.
